about_content.mission: Bhartiya Sena Seva is an independent research-based aggregator platform dedicated to increasing awareness, transparency, and citizen participation in authentic government-backed armed forces welfare funds. We bridge the gap between citizens and soldier welfare initiatives through comprehensive, verified information.
about_content.vision: To be the most trusted and comprehensive source of information on armed forces welfare schemes, enabling every citizen to make informed decisions about supporting our nation's heroes and their families.
about_content.story: Bhartiya Sena Seva was born from a deep sense of patriotism and the desire to contribute meaningfully to our nation. As a citizen, I felt the need to bridge the information gap between welfare schemes and the people they're meant to serve. This platform represents my humble contribution to honoring the sacrifices of our armed forces personnel and their families. By aggregating verified information and making it accessible, I hope to enable more citizens to participate in supporting those who protect our nation.
